statements: SELECT id, location, deforestation_area, climate_change_impact FROM dashboard_deforestation;
SELECT location, deforestation_area, id, climate_change_impact FROM dashboard_deforestation;
SELECT climate_change_impact, location, id, deforestation_area FROM dashboard_deforestation;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_deforestation WHERE location='Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT id, SUM(deforestation_area) AS total_deforestation_area FROM dashboard_deforestation GROUP BY id;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_deforestation WHERE deforestation_area > 1000 ORDER BY deforestation_area DESC
SELECT id, location, climate_change_impact FROM dashboard_deforestation WHERE climate_change_impact = 'severe'
SELECT location, deforestation_area FROM dashboard_deforestation WHERE deforestation_area < 500 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM dashboard_deforestation WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT id, location, deforestation_area, climate_change_impact FROM dashboard_deforestation
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25.0
SELECT location, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM climate_data ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT location, temperature FROM climate_data WHERE humidity < 70.0
SELECT dashboard_id, user_id, theme FROM dashboard_settings WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND deforestation_rate <= 0.5
SELECT * FROM dashboard_settings WHERE user_id = 123 AND theme = 'Dark Mode'
SELECT dashboard_id, user_id, jsonb_array_length(widget_settings->'widgets') AS widget_count FROM dashboard_settings
SELECT country, forest_type, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data;
SELECT climate_event, precipitation, temperature FROM climate_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM dashboard_visualization;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data WHERE climate_impact='Severe';
SELECT country, dashboard_type FROM dashboard_visualization WHERE date='2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data WHERE country = 'Brazil';
SELECT country, forest_type, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data WHERE country = 'Indonesia' ORDER BY deforestation_rate DESC;
SELECT country, SUM(deforestation_rate) AS total_deforestation FROM deforestation_data GROUP BY country HAVING total_deforestation > 5;
SELECT climate_event, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM climate_data GROUP BY climate_event ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC;
SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS visualization_count FROM dashboard_visualization GROUP BY country HAVING visualization_count >= 2 ORDER BY visualization_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangeData;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationCauses ORDER BY cause_name DESC;
SELECT cause_id, cause_name FROM DeforestationCauses WHERE cause_id = 2;
SELECT user_name, subscription_status FROM DashboardUsers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE temperature < 15;
SELECT location, deforestation_percentage FROM ClimateChangeData WHERE deforestation_percentage BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY deforestation_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationCauses WHERE cause_id = 3;
SELECT user_name, subscription_status FROM DashboardUsers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_impact;
SELECT country_name, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_impact WHERE forest_area_km2 > 10000;
SELECT AVG(forest_area_km2) AS avg_forest_area FROM deforestation_impact;
SELECT * FROM climate_data ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT metric_name, impact_value FROM impact_metrics WHERE impact_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_impact;
SELECT country_name, forest_area_km2 FROM deforestation_impact WHERE forest_area_km2 > 50000;
SELECT year, temperature_celsius, humidity_percentage FROM climate_data ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT metric_name, impact_value FROM impact_metrics WHERE impact_value < 0.05 ORDER BY impact_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
